content.data:
[Y]Demo Layout
[W]Sequence effects like a story.
[c][m.]
[W]Open with clarity, escalate with
[W]contrast and finish with a memorable
[W]signature.
[W]Transitions should be intentional and
[W]quick to keep momentum.
[c][m.]
[G]- Hook quickly.
[G]- Escalate cleanly.
[G]- Finish strong.
[m][m-]
[Y]STAGING
[C]Order matters as much as effects.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
